title: F/S Gently Used Copy of the Old Judge Book *SOLD*

posts.post_title: F/S Gently Used Copy of the Old Judge Book *SOLD*
posts.post_content: I have a used copy of the Old Judge book for sale in basically as good of condition as it was when I bought it. I'm asking $100 which includes free shipping. Paypal is preferred at no charge. First person to email me saying they'll take it is the new owner!

Hello 

I'll take it if you dont mind me sending out a money order.

Frank L

[url]flastra@tampabay.rr.com[/url]
That's no problem. I'll email you with my shipping info. Thanks!
